text: tam'ma manas'sugalalli rogaviruvavaru avaredege dhavisi hoguvudannu nivu kanuviri. ‘‘Nam'mannu kalacakravu badhisitemba (apatkala banditemba) bhaya namagide‘‘endu avaru heluttare. Nijavagi, allahanu (sighradalle) vijayavannu tandu koduva athava tanna kadeyinda ondu visesa adesavannu kaluhisuva sadhyate ide. Aga avaru, tam'ma manas'sugalolage baccittiruva visayagala kuritu pascattapa padabahudu
